mapper.insert: insert into instalmentRequests (billId, policyId, createdAt, amount, status) values (#{instalmentRequest.bill.id}, #{instalmentRequest.policy.id}, #{instalmentRequest.createdAt}, #{instalmentRequest.amount}, #{instalmentRequest.status})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.createdAt, a.status, a.billId, a.policyId, a.amount, b.id as ItemId, b.amount as ItemAmount, b.commission as ItemCommission, b.repaymentDay as ItemRepaymentDay from instalmentRequests a left join instalmentItems b on a.id = b.instalmentRequestId where a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update instalmentRequests set status = #{instalmentRequest.status} where id = #{instalmentRequest.id}
